extendedInfo.description: This is a simple, retro-style night clock. It will display the time in big, bold letters. It has five different clock skins (red, white, blue, green and real classic). Night Clock HD is the only app which has a monochrome style classic digital clock (luminous clock).Night clock HD allows you to control your screen brightness and it consumes unnoticeable power. It works with both landscape and patriot orientations and there are two different clock interfaces.Features:-	Five different clock skins -	Advanced power saving algorithm to save power-	Brightness control-	Supports both screen orientations You can use the Night Clock HD as an alarm clock or you can even use the built-in Android alarm.We look forward to your comments and wishes.** Recent Comments **It z very nice im using like my room clock in night times.Its so cool I just want to know if you can set a alarm on itRecommend this app. First time I have felt like rating an app**2012-08-10 Update-bug fixes-added Alarm-Option to lock orientations**NOTE**This App is compliant with all of Googleâs Content Policy requirements and it contains icon and notification ads.go to the menu and tap on 'About Ads' for more information.-----------------------------------------------------------This app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app â Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.

reviews.title: Way too many airpush ads. Unacceptable!
reviews.comment: I understand that an app development is payed by a purchase or by ads, but 3-4 airpushes a day is just out of proportion.
reviews.author: Andy Haeusler

reviews.title: Spoilt by adds
reviews.comment: Ridiculous amount of intrusive adds, spoils what could be a half decent app!!
reviews.author: Dale Allard

reviews.title: Avoid this developer
reviews.comment: Intrusive ads. Never download any app from this developer. May he die in hell slowly and painfully.
reviews.author: Vytautas \305\240ileika

reviews.title: Airpush ads. Grrrrr
reviews.comment: I really liked this app and would\'ve paid for it, but the Airpush ads in the notification area were annoying. Get rid of that and I would happily reinstall.
reviews.author: Paul Barraclough

reviews.title: Hate the adds
reviews.comment: The push nitifications on your home screen is realy annoying
reviews.author: Rudolf van Rooyen

reviews.title: Spam beware
reviews.comment: I know free apps have ads, but 3 or 4 push ads an hour is excessive. Liked the clock, but not worth the trouble of the ads. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Katie Stephens

reviews.title: Full of ads
reviews.comment: Good app, but intrusive ads

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Got one that goes backwards like a timer now that would be cool

reviews.title: Get rid of push
reviews.comment: I would pay for this to get rid of push notification

reviews.title: Just perfect....almost.
reviews.comment: Would get five stars if the dimming worked. Other than that just what I was looking for.

reviews.comment: Good, but could be better.....

reviews.title: Ads popups on my home screen?!
reviews.comment: I pay for nice apps and I\'m willing to pay for ad-free version of Night Clock HD, but will not tollerate any ads popups or ads notifications spam in \"free\" version. No thanks! Bye bye!
reviews.author: Andrew Dubinin

reviews.title: Adware. Avoid Avoid Avoid!
reviews.comment: Pop Up adds in your notification. Utterly reprehensible. Do not install. Also, the majority of 5 star reviews here look fake. This is not a \"Cool game\" nor is it \"The best app ever\" or \"A must have for ALl!\" Shameless.
reviews.author: John Nevill

reviews.title: Malware
reviews.comment: Add supported, but in a way that makes it identical to malware. Beware!

reviews.comment: Hmmm I have no problem with ads but pop ups on my home screen saying I have a virus no way real shame the clock is nice uninstalled

reviews.title: The app is okay
reviews.comment: The idea : ok  The number of ads : horrible  I don\'t even see a real use for this app
